markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel the Godmind](/Feats.aspx?ID=2488) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings. For 1 minute, you gain precise motion sense out to 60 feet, you can see [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures and objects, and you gain the effects of a 9th-level [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344).
name: Channel the Godmind
